roleset.name: remain unsettled; wait
roleset.note: PEND-V NOTES: Frames file for 'pend' based on sentences in ECTB. (from pend.01-v predicate notes)
PENDING-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from pending.01-j)

example.text: It pends action in the Senate.

example.name: with infinitival clause
example.text: ... while the law pends * to be decreed by the president.
example.arg: * to be decreed by the president

example.name: adjectival use
example.text: Currently, work has stopped, pending government orders.
